species.name: munchlax
descriptions: Anything that looks edible, Munchlax will go on and swallow whole. Its stomach is tough enough to handle it even if the food has gone rotten.
In its desperation to gulp down food, it forgets about the food it has hidden under its fur.
It conceals food under the long fur on its body. It carts around this food stash and swallows it without chewing.
It hides food under its long body hair. However, it forgets it has hidden the food.
It needs to consume its own weight in food every day. As far as flavor is concerned, it’s indifferent.

abilities.name: pickup
abilities.effect: Picks up other Pokémon's used and Flung held items.  May also pick up an item after battle.

abilities.name: thick-fat
abilities.effect: Halves damage from fire and ice moves.

abilities.name: gluttony
abilities.effect: Makes the Pokémon eat any held Berry triggered by low HP below 1/2 its max HP.
